description: This file contains CSS variables and styles for managing the theme and layout of the Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling with background color and text alignment.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling including layout adjustments for branding and environment.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, including transitions for color changes.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button which allows users to switch between light and dark themes.
